name: Evasion
description: When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

name: Sneak Attack
description: Once per turn, you deal an extra #sneak_damage_dice# damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. You don't need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is in melee range with it.

name: Rakish Audacity
description: You can use Sneak Attack against a creature if no other creatures are in melee range with you.

name: Uncanny Dodge
description: The first time an opponent hits you with an attack on a given turn, you will halve the attack's damage against you.

name: Skill Expert
description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for ability checks you make that uses the following skill: #skills#.

name: Expertise
description: Your proficiency bonus is doubled for ability checks you make that uses any of the following skills: #skills#.

name: Dual Wielder
description: You have +1 AC when dual wielding. You can dual wield with non-light weapons.

name: Fighting Initiate
description: You gain an extra Fighting Style

name: Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting)
description: When you engage in two-weapon fighting, you add your ability modifier to the damage of the second attack.

name: Crossbow Expert
description: Being near an hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls. You can multiattack with crossbows (ignore the loading quality). When you use the Attack action and attack with a one handed weapon, you can use a bonus action to attack with a hand crossbow you are holding.

name: Thrown Weapon Expert
description: Being near an hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged attack rolls. You can draw a weapon that has the thrown property as part of the attack you make with the weapon. When you use the Attack action and attack only with thrown weapons, you can use a bonus action to attack with a thrown weapon you are holding, adding your ability modifier to the damage.

name: Arcane Recovery
description: When you finish a short rest, you automatically recover spell slots of a combined level equals to #class_level# (your wizard level). This ability will automatically activate the first time you take a short rest each day, but only if you have used at least #half_class_level# combined spell slots that day.

name: Chronal Shift
description: 1/4 chance of rerolling any attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, whether made by you or an opponent.

name: Lucky Spirit
description: 1/3 chance of having advantage on any attack roll, ability check, or saving throw made by you. 1/3 chance of making an enemy roll their attack roll with disadvantage.

name: Lucky
description: 1/5 chance of having advantage on any attack roll, ability check, or saving throw made by you. 1/5 chance of making an enemy roll their attack roll with disadvantage.

name: Tough
description: Your hit point maximum increases by 2 hit points per level.

name: War Caster
description: Being near an hostile creature doesn't impose disadvantage on your ranged spell attack rolls. You have advantage on Constitution saving throws that you make to maintain your concentration on a spell when you take damage.

name: Animal Companion
description: You gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and is trained to fight alongside you.

name: Favored enemy
description: You gain a +4 bonus to damage rolls to weapon attacks against #parenthesis_content#.

name: Extra Attack
description: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

name: Mobile
description: You can target 3 different ranged opponents with a melee weapon each turn instead of 2.

name: Keen Senses
description: You have proficiency in the Perception skill.

name: Clumsy
description: Your Dexterity score is reduced by 1, but you gain a +1 to your constitution score.

name: Born in the Shadows
description: Your Charisma score is reduced by 2, but you gain a +2 to your dexterity score.

name: Chaotic Nature
description: +2 to one ability score and +1 to all ability scores with an even number, but your wisdom can never be above 5.

name: Custom Lineage
description: Instead of choosing one of the game's races, you have created your own lineage. Basically the same as human variant starting race, but with a choice between darkvision and proficiency in one skill.

name: Darkvision
description: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

name: Superior Darkvision
description: You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light.

name: Shadow Walk
description: You gain the ability to step from one shadow into another. When you are in dim light or darkness, you can teleport up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space you can see that is also in dim light or darkness.

name: Sorcery Points
description: You have #max_sorcery_points# sorcery points. These points are used for metamagic (see the specific metamagic talents). Additionally, sorcery points will be automatically used if you lack the necessary spell slots when casting a spell (2 sorcery points for level 1, 3 for level 2, 5 for level 3, 6 for level 4 and 7 for level 5). You regain all your expanded sorcery points after a long rest.

name: Heightened Spell (Metamagic)
description: When you cast a spell that forces a creature to make a saving throw to resist its effects, you can use 3 sorcery points to give the first target of the spell disadvantage on its saving throw.

name: Twinned Spell (Metamagic)
description: When you cast a spell that targets only one creature, you can spend a number of sorcery points equal to the spell's level to target a second creature in range with the same spell (1 sorcery point if the spell is a cantrip).

name: Metamagic Adept
description: You gain 3 extra sorcery points.

name: Resilient
description: You gain proficiency in #parenthesis_content_stat# saving throws and can increase 1 ability score by 1.

name: Fighting Style (Archery)
description: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.

name: Horde Breaker
description: The first time on each of your turns that you make a weapon attack against a creature in melee range, you will make another attack with the same weapon against a different creature that is also in melee range.

name: Multiattack Defense
description: When a creature hits you with an attack, you gain a +4 bonus to AC against all subsequent attacks made by that creature for the rest of the turn.

name: Fighting Style (Close Quarters Shooter)
description: When making a ranged attack while you are within 5 feet of a hostile creature, you do not have disadvantage on the attack roll. You have a +1 bonus to attack rolls on ranged attacks.

name: Great Weapon Master (GW Master)
description: When attacking with a heavy weapon, will apply a -5 penalty to the attack roll for a +10 damage bonus, but only if the hit chance is 50% or higher. When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 hit points, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action.

name: Sharpshooter (SharpS)
description: When attacking with a ranged weapon, will apply a -5 penalty to the attack roll for a +10 damage bonus, but only if the hit chance is 50% or higher.

name: Reckless Sharpshooter
description: The sharpshooter talent will always be used, even when the chances of hitting the enemy goes below 50%.

name: Spirit Attack
description: Your attack is replaced with a Spirit Attack, which always does #sneak_damage_dice# + Wis modifier on a hit.

name: Metallic Body
description: Your base AC is 15 + your Dexterity modifier (max +2). You cannot wear armor.

name: Spirit Barrier
description: Your base AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier.

name: Resistance
description: You have resistance to #parenthesis_content# damage.

name: Cloak of Protection
description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wear this cloak.

name: Robotic Brain
description: You gain a +4 bonus to your Intelligence score. Your maximum intelligence score is now 24.

name: blue blood
description: You gain a +2 bonus to your charisma score. You haver proficiency in the persuasion and deception skills.

name: Targeting System
description: When you attack with the weapons concealed in your body, you can use your Intelligence modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity modifier, for the attack and damage rolls.

name: Unarmored Defense
description: While you are wearing no armor and not wielding a shield, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Wisdom modifier.

name: Martial Arts
description: When you use the Attack action with an unarmed strike on your turn, you can make one unarmed strike as a bonus action. You can roll a #unarmed_damage_dice# in place of the normal damage of your unarmed strike. You can use Dexterity instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of your unarmed strikes.

name: Ki Points
description: You have #max_ki_points# ki points. These points can be used to perform Flurry of Blows or Patient Defense. You regain all your ki points after a short rest.

name: Flurry of Blows
description: When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a bonus action (replaces the bonus unarmed strike from martial arts).

name: Patient defense
description: You can spend 1 ki point to take the Dodge action as a bonus action on your turn (replaces the bonus unarmed strike from martial arts). Until the start of your next turn, any attack roll made against you has disadvantage and you make Dexterity saving throws with advantage.

name: Fire Fists
description: Whenever you perform a Flurry of Blows, you add +2 fire damage to each of your extra strikes.

name: Deflect Missiles
description: The first time an opponent hits you with a ranged attack that does piercing damage on a given turn, you will instead catch the projectile in midair, taking no damage from that attack.

name: Ki Adept
description: You gain 3 extra ki points.

name: Reckless Attack
description: You can choose to attack recklessly at the start of your turn. You then have advantage on melee weapon attack rolls, but attack rolls against you have also have advantage.

name: Rage
description: You can start raging when in battle. You gain the following benefits: You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws, you gain a +#rage_bonus# bonus to your weapon damage and you have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage. Once you have raged #daily_max_rage_amount# times, you need to take a long rest before you can rage again. Each rage lasts for 1 minute and ends early if you are no longer in battle.

name: Frostblade's Frenzy
description: Whenever you either start a new battle or start raging, you must make a Wisdom saving throw. The DC for this saving throw is 8 plus the number of previously resisted frenzies (this number resets when you frenzy). If you fail, you enter a frenzied rage, which lasts until all visible opponents are defeated (even if it takes more than one minute). You can then make a single melee weapon attack as a bonus action on each of your turns. When the rage ends, you suffer one level of exhaustion, causing disadvantage on ability and skill checks. You cannot rage again until this exhaustion is removed through a short or long rest.

name: Danger Sense
description: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws.

name: Jack of All Trades
description: You add half your proficiency bonus, rounded down, to any ability check you make that doesn't already include your proficiency bonus.

name: Domain (#domain_name#)
description: You have access to the #domain_name# domain spells, even if those are not on the cleric's spell list. See your domain spells list below.

name: Oath (#domain_name#)
description: You have access to the #domain_name# oath spells, even if those are not on the paladin's spell list. See your oath spells list below.

name: Specialist (#domain_name#)
description: You have access to the #domain_name# specialist spells, even if those are not on the artificer's spell list. See your specialist spells list below.

name: Touch of Light
description: You gain a bonus to your weapon damage rolls equal to your cleric level / 2 (#touch_of_magic_bonus#).

name: Touch of Death
description: You gain a bonus to your weapon damage rolls equal to your cleric level / 2 (#touch_of_magic_bonus#).

name: Multiclass
description: You have gained levels in multiple classes (#parenthesis_content#).

name: Fighting Style (Dueling)
description: When you are wielding a melee weapon in one hand and no other weapons, you gain a +2 bonus to damage rolls with that weapon.

name: Second Wind
description: During your next turn, you will automatically heal yourself by 1d10 + #class_level# (Your fighter level). Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again. A second wind is automatically triggered whenever your hit points are reduced below 50% of your maximum, if it's available.

name: Action Surge
description: Doubles the number of attacks you can next turn. Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

name: Random Action Surge
description: Each turn of battle, you have 1/8 chances of triggering a random action surge, doubling the number of attacks you can make that turn. This doesn't count as using your action surge (don't need to finish a short or long rest).

name: Skilled
description: You gain proficiency in three skills.

name: Skill Versatility
description: You gain proficiency in two skills.

name: Divine Smite
description: You can expend one spell slot of the highest available level to deal radiant damage to the target, in addition to the weapon's damage. The extra damage is 2d8 for a 1st-level spell slot, plus 1d8 for each spell level higher than 1st. The damage increases by 1d8 if the target is an undead or a fiend. A level 1 smite will automatically be performed on a critical hit, if a smite is not already specified for that attack, and will not cost a spell slot.

name: Lay on Hands
description: Your blessed touch can heal wounds. You have a pool of healing power that replenishes when you take a long rest. With that pool, you can restore a total number of hit points equal to your paladin level x 5.

name: Aura of Protection
description: You gain a bonus to saving throw rolls equal to your Charisma modifier (#stat_mod_cha#). This bonus also applies to friendly creatures.

name: Aura of Conquest
description: You gain a bonus to melee weapon damage rolls equal to half of your Charisma modifier (#half_stat_mod_cha#). This bonus also applies to friendly creatures.

name: Aura of Armor
description: You gain a +1 bonus to AC. This bonus also applies to friendly creatures.

name: holy shield
description: You can treat your shield as a melee weapon that does 1d6 + Strength modifier damage. Using an enchanted shield will provide the same bonus to attack as it does to AC (e.g., a +1 AC shield is also considered a +1 weapon).

name: Stealth Disadvantage
description: You have disadvantage on Stealth checks.

name: Heavy Armor Master
description: While you are wearing heavy armor, bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage that you take is reduced by 3.

name: Shield Master
description: You can add your shield's AC bonus to any Dexterity saving throw. If you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you can instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw.

name: Blade Mastery
description: You gain the following benefits when using a longsword or a greatsword: You gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls, you gain +1 to AC while you are not wielding a weapon in each hands and you gain an additional +1 AC when wielding a weapon with one hand and no shields.

name: Flash of Genius
description: 1/4 chance of gaining a bonus equal to your Intelligence modifier (#stat_mod_int#) to any skill checks you make.

name: Battle Ready
description: When you attack with a magic weapon, you can use your Intelligence modifier, instead of Strength or Dexterity modifier, for the attack and damage rolls.

name: Remarkable Athlete
description: You add half your proficiency bonus (rounded up) to any Strength, Dexterity, or Constitution check you make.

name: Improved Critical
description: Your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

name: Fighting Style (Great Weapon Fighting)
description: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack you make with a melee weapon that you are wielding with two hands, you reroll the die and must use the new roll, even if the new roll is a 1 or a 2.

name: Fast Hands
description: You add half your proficiency bonus (rounded up) to any Sleight of Hand or Thieves Tools skill checks you make. You can also always end your turn with a weapon in one or both hands, even when using your action to do something other than attacking during your turn.

name: Skulker
description: You can try to hide when you are lightly obscured from the creature from which you are hiding. When you are hidden, making an attack doesn't reveal your position until the end of your turn.

name: Bardic Inspiration
description: You gain a number of bardic inspiration dice (#bardic_inspiration_dice#) equal to your Charisma modifier (#stat_mod_cha#). You can use one of them to inspire your allies, adding your inspiration dice on their attack rolls and saving throw until your next turn. You regain any expended uses when you finish a short or long rest.

name: Unsettling Words (Bardic Inspiration)
description: You can use one of your bardic inspiration dice to unsettle an opponent while you cast a spell. The creature must substract the number rolled on your bardic inspiration dice (#bardic_inspiration_dice#) from the number rolled on it's saving throw.

name: Silver Tongue
description: When you make a Charisma (Persuasion) or Charisma (Deception) check, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

name: Arcane Ward
description: Whenever you finish a long rest, you weave a magic ward around yourself for protection. The ward has hit points equal to twice your wizard level + your Intelligence modifier (For a total of #max_arcane_ward_hp#). Whenever you take damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If this damage reduces the ward to 0 hit points, it breaks at the start of your next turn.

name: Disciple of Life
description: Whenever you use a spell of 1st level or higher to restore hit points to a creature (including yourself), the creature regains additional hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level.

name: Preserve Life
description: Whenever you use a spell to restore hit points to a creature (including yourself), the creature regains additional hit points equal to your cleric level (#class_level#).

name: Polearm Master
description: When you take the Attack action and attack with a staff, you can use a bonus action to make a melee attack with the opposite end of the weapon. This attack uses the same ability modifier as the primary attack. The weapon's damage die for this attack is a d6 (d8 if wielding the weapon with two hands), and it deals bludgeoning damage.

name: Wild Magic
description: Whenever you cast a spell, there's a 25% chance of triggering a wild magic surge, resulting in a random magical effect determined by rolling a 1d100.

name: Tides of Chaos
description: You have a 75% chance to gain a +2 bonus to any attack roll, ability check, or saving throw you make, but a 25% chance that it will be a -2 penalty instead.

name: Assassinate
description: You have advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn in the combat yet. In addition, any hit you score against a creature that is surprised is a critical hit.

name: Bonus Proficiencies
description: You gain proficiency with the disguise kit and the poisoner's kit.

name: Elven Accuracy
description: Whenever you have advantage on an attack roll, you can reroll one of the dice once.

name: Pugilistic Arts
description: When you take the Attack action with an unarmed strike on your turn, you can make an additional unarmed strike as a bonus action. You can roll a 1d4 instead of the normal damage for your unarmed strike (1d6 after level 5, 1d8 after level 11). Attacks made while wearing metal gauntlets count as unarmed strikes and deal the same damage. These gauntlets can be enchanted to provide the same bonuses as a regular weapon (e.g., a +1 weapon).

name: Brutal Critical
description: You can roll one additional weapon damage die when determining the extra damage for a critical hit with a melee attack.

name: Fighting Style (Unarmed Fighting)
description: Your unarmed strikes can deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d6 + your Strength modifier on a hit. If you aren't wielding any weapons or a shield when you make the attack roll, the d6 becomes a d8.

name: Empowered Evocation
description: You can add your Intelligence modifier (#stat_mod_int#) to one damage roll of any wizard spell that you cast.

name: Overchannel
description: When you cast a wizard spell of 1st through 5th level that deals damage, you have a 20% chance of dealing maximum damage with that spell.

name: Staff of Power
description: You gain a +2 bonus to AC and saving throws while you wielding this staff.

name: Staff of Darkness
description: You can use your spellcasting ability instead of Strength for the attack and damage rolls of melee attacks using that weapon.

name: Autocast
description: Autocast spells in the talent list will be cast automatically at the start of each day, and will last until your next long rest (they never need to be cast manually).

name: Mage Armor (Autocast lvl #autocast_level#)
description: Your AC becomes 13 + its Dexterity modifier.

name: Aid (Autocast lvl #autocast_level#)
description: Your hit point maximum and current hit points increase by #dnd_hp#.

name: Death Ward (Autocast lvl #autocast_level#)
description: When you drop to 0 hit points as a result of taking damage, you are brought back to 1 hit point at the start of your turn and the spell ends.

name: Advantage / Disadvantage
description: When you have advantage / disadvantage on a d20 roll, you roll a second d20. You use the higher of the two rolls if you have advantage, and the lower roll if you have disadvantage. If circumstances cause a roll to have both advantage and disadvantage, you are considered to have neither of them, and you roll only one d20.

name: Ability Score Improvement
description: Increase #parenthesis_content_stat# by 2.
